criteriaResults.criterion: Bootstrap SQLite schema for features with defaults and timestamps | 初始化 SQLite 功能项表，含默认值和时间戳 works as expected
criteriaResults.reasoning:
Here is the professional prompt: 'Verify the SQLite features schema initializes with defaults (module "other", status restricted with default "todo", priority default 3) and timestamp fields, including trigger upkeep, when the database starts.' → Executing now...
> 专业提示：“确认 SQLite 功能项表在数据库启动时创建并包含默认值（module 默认为 other、status 受限且默认 todo、priority 默认为 3）及时间戳字段，并含有更新时间戳的触发器。”
Schema creates the features table with required fields and defaults plus createdAt/updatedAt timestamps, and a CHECK-constrained status/priority; an AFTER UPDATE trigger refreshes updatedAt to datetime('now'), and initDatabase runs on startup to apply the schema. No automated tests found for this behavior, so confidence relies on code inspection.
> 架构创建了带必填字段和默认值的 features 表，并含 createdAt/updatedAt 时间戳以及约束的状态/优先级；AFTER UPDATE 触发器会将 updatedAt 刷新为当前时间，initDatabase 在启动时运行以应用该架构。未找到覆盖此行为的自动化测试，因此结论基于代码检查。

criteriaResults.criterion: Sync filters to URL query params and hydrate state on refresh | 将过滤条件同步到 URL 并在刷新时恢复 works as expected
criteriaResults.reasoning:
Filter selections are pushed into the URL via updateUrlParams and the watch on statusFilter/moduleFilter triggers both router.replace and reloads with the current query (frontend/src/views/HomeView.vue:56-67).
> 通过对 statusFilter/moduleFilter 的侦听，updateUrlParams 将筛选值写入 URL 并触发基于当前查询的重新加载（frontend/src/views/HomeView.vue:56-67）。
On mount, syncFiltersFromUrl reads route.query into reactive filters before loading data, so refreshing with query params rehydrates state (frontend/src/views/HomeView.vue:50-72).
> 挂载时 syncFiltersFromUrl 在加载数据前读取 route.query 到响应式筛选器，因此携带查询参数刷新页面会恢复筛选状态（frontend/src/views/HomeView.vue:50-72）。
No automated tests cover this flow, so assurance comes only from the implementation review.
> 缺少针对该流程的自动化测试，因此信心仅来自实现审查。

frontend.features.url-sync.overallReasoning:
Implementation syncs filter state to URL query parameters via router.replace and reloads data on changes, and hydrates filters from route.query on mount to restore state after refresh, but there are no automated tests verifying this path.
> 实现通过 router.replace 将筛选状态同步到 URL 并在变更时重新加载数据，挂载时从 route.query 恢复筛选以支持刷新后的状态恢复，但缺少验证此路径的自动化测试。
suggestions:
Add component or E2E tests covering filter-to-URL sync and refresh hydration using Vue Test Utils or Cypress to prevent regressions.
> 使用 Vue Test Utils 或 Cypress 添加覆盖筛选到 URL 同步与刷新恢复的组件/端到端测试以防回归。
codeQualityNotes:
Back/forward navigation changing query params will not re-sync filters because route.query is only read on mount; consider watching route changes if that scenario matters.
> 浏览器前进/后退导致查询参数变化时不会重新同步筛选，因为 route.query 只在挂载时读取；如需支持此场景可监听路由变化。

> 路由在 `frontend/src/main.ts:24-27` 定义了路径 `/features/:id`，名称为 `detail`，组件通过动态 import 按需加载，符合详情页懒加载要求。

criteriaResults.criterion: Navigating to /features/1 loads the detail page without errors
criteriaResults.reasoning:
The router maps `/features/:id` to `DetailView`, which on mount reads the `id` param and calls `fetchFeature` while managing loading, not-found, and error states; this supports loading a detail page for `/features/1` without uncaught errors when the feature exists, though no automated tests currently cover this path.
> 路由将 `/features/:id` 映射到 `DetailView`，组件在挂载时读取 `id` 参数并调用 `fetchFeature`，同时处理加载、未找到和错误状态；这支持在存在对应特性的情况下访问 `/features/1` 时无未捕获错误，尽管当前没有自动化测试覆盖该路径。

frontend.features.detail-route.overallReasoning:
Both criteria appear satisfied: the router defines the lazy-loaded detail route and the DetailView fetches by id with error handling; however, there is no test coverage for navigating directly to the detail page.
> 两项准则看起来都已满足：路由定义了懒加载的详情路径，DetailView 会按 ID 拉取并处理错误；但当前没有直接导航到详情页的测试覆盖。
suggestions:
Add a Playwright scenario that creates a feature then visits `/features/:id` to confirm the detail view renders without errors.
> 增加一个 Playwright 场景，先创建特性再访问 `/features/:id`，确认详情页无错误渲染。
codeQualityNotes:
DetailView reads the route param once on mount; if the same component instance is reused for a different id, it will not refetch unless the route reloads.
> DetailView 只在挂载时读取路由参数；如果同一组件实例被用于不同 ID，则不会重新获取数据，除非路由重新加载。

criteriaResults.criterion: DetailView has 'Edit' button navigating to /edit/:id

criteriaResults.criterion: DetailView handles loading state with spinner/message
criteriaResults.reasoning:
loadFeature sets isLoading true during fetch and template shows a centered “Loading feature...” message while isLoading, satisfying loading feedback albeit without tests.
> loadFeature 在请求期间将 isLoading 设为 true，模板在 isLoading 时显示居中的 “Loading feature...” 提示，满足加载反馈需求，但尚无测试。

criteriaResults.criterion: DetailView shows 404 message for non-existent feature
criteriaResults.reasoning:

> 错误消息含 “404” 或 “not found” 会将 notFound 设为 true，从而显示模板中的未找到提示和返回链接，符合 404 处理，但该路径缺少自动化测试。

> DetailView.vue 在代码中实现了九项需求，包括标题、保留空白的描述、彩色状态徽章、模块与优先级显示、格式化时间戳、返回/编辑导航、加载提示和未找到回退，但没有自动化测试覆盖该视图，因此结论依赖代码审查。
suggestions:
